title: 08/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, with NBA Free Agency opening up tonight, Could we see the likes of Chris Paul and Kawhi Leonard on different teams? What's the outlook for the Colts and Cowboys, with both of their QBs injured? And Nick Wright joins us to explain why he thinks Russ Westbrook to the Lakers will work.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, with NBA Free Agency opening up tonight, Could we see the likes of Chris Paul and Kawhi Leonard on different teams? What's the outlook for the Colts and Cowboys, with both of their QBs injured? And Nick Wright joins us to explain why he thinks Russ Westbrook to the Lakers will work.
